en.start-message: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to TooGoodNotify! I'm here to help you get notified when TooGoodToGo magic bags are available. Use /help to see what I can do for you. ğŸ
en.help-message: ğŸ¤” Need help? Here are the commands you can use: - /start: Start interacting with the bot - /help: Show this help message - /settings: Configure your preferences - /pause: Pause the bot and set a cooldown time - /status: Check the current bot status - /wakeup: Wake up the bot and remove the cooldown - /about: Learn more about this bot
en.settings-message: âš™ï¸ Settings Here you can configure your preferences: - Use /language to change your preferred language. - Use /notifications_start or /notifications_stop to control notifications.
en.about-message: â„¹ï¸ About TooGoodNotify This bot helps you stay updated on TooGoodToGo magic bags from stores youâ€™ve set as favorites in your TooGoodToGo app. ğŸš€ Please note, this bot is not officially affiliated with the TooGoodToGo company.
